channel.title: Axo to toggle Midi on/off in external equipment
channel.description: This is probably really obvious but I want to send out midi CC values 0 on press and 127 on the next press out of USB midi . This is what I've got but there's no action in my external unit. Any ideas?

item.title: Axo to toggle Midi on/off in external equipment
item.dc:creator: @Gaznesh gareth whittock
item.description:
@Gaznesh wrote:

Ah, sorry I was too vague. I appreciate the input anyway.. Many thanks

Read full topic
item.source: Axo to toggle Midi on/off in external equipment

item.title: Axo to toggle Midi on/off in external equipment
item.dc:creator: @reubenfinger
item.description:
@reubenfinger wrote:

Think I've misinterpreted what you wanted that arrangement is on/off,

This is probably really obvious but I want to send out midi CC values 0 on press and 127 on the next press

I thought that you wanted: one press trigs value 0 then a second press trigs value 127, and that you intended to build off that for other values like no press 0, one press 64, 2nd press 127....d'oh just reread the topic title, sorry for the wild goose chase, glad you got where you needed to go.

By the way, In your case for on/off you shouldn't need anything more than gpio/in/digital > logic/toggle > midi/out/thin.

Read full topic
item.source: Axo to toggle Midi on/off in external equipment

item.title: Axo to toggle Midi on/off in external equipment
item.dc:creator: @Gaznesh gareth whittock
item.description:

Thanks for that. I still couldn't get that to work but this does - I'm not sure why though..

item.title: Axo to toggle Midi on/off in external equipment
item.dc:creator: @reubenfinger
item.description:
@reubenfinger wrote:

yeah skip it just trig directly from the gpio/in/digital, it was a half assed attempt at a debounce, as sometimes when I go live I get a trig from some of my encoder buttons, sorry it was a quick reply what's below will work, internal port selected just for illustration.

Screenshot 2021-03-10 at 22.45.51.png1650x572 57.8 KB

Read full topic

item.title: Axo to toggle Midi on/off in external equipment
item.dc:creator: @Gaznesh gareth whittock
item.description:
@Gaznesh wrote:

Thanks. I'll give it a go.. Not sure about the ctrl/toggle though. I don't get what it's supposed to do.. Cheers though..

item.source: Axo to toggle Midi on/off in external equipment

item.title: Axo to toggle Midi on/off in external equipment
item.dc:creator: @reubenfinger
item.description:
@reubenfinger wrote:

there are loads of ways to do this in Axo, I quite like rbrts rbrt/control/click hold s which means that 1 gpio can be two switches dependant on if it's a short or long press.

try this:

Screenshot 2021-03-10 at 17.36.26.png1650x572 61.6 KB

away from my axo and can't test, but should be fine, if not change the counter to a 2 instead of a 3....let me know if it's not what you want, or if I've misinterpretted your needs.

Read full topic
